definition: specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional

line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: He graduated from Xi'an international university , the Department of Foreign Languages English majors.
sentences.chinese: 毕业于西安外事学院，外语系英语专业。

sentences.english: All images by Koichi Mitsui Koichi Mitsui is a professional photographer in Japan. When he's not on the job shooting for magazines and ads, he wanders around Tokyo taking pictures with his iPhone 3GS.
sentences.chinese: 三井光一是日本一位专业摄影师。

sentences.english: I will graduate from eking University this July. I have majored in accounting.
sentences.chinese: 今年七月将从北京大学毕业，我主修的专业是会计学。

sentences.english: The medical student studies the skeleton of the human body.
sentences.chinese: 医学专业的学生研究人体的尸骸。

sentences.english: A key part of the program hasbeen to commercialize outstanding health science technologies from themedical colleges.
sentences.chinese: 专业的核心是将医学院校的生命科学技术商品化。

sentences.english: Professional athletes were fully embraced, finally ending the tradition of amateurism at the games.
sentences.chinese: 专业运动员被完全接受，终于在比赛结束的业余传统。

sentences.english: Accounting major cultivates applied talents with high comprehensive quality, strong professional skills.
sentences.chinese: 会计专业培养综合素质高，专业技能强的应用型人才。

sentences.english: Our peripheries are the professional markets of cellular phone accessories and the electronics product export.
sentences.chinese: 我们的周边是手机配件及电子产品出口的专业市场。

sentences.english: The beauty host displayed the professional with fluent English.
sentences.chinese: 主持人用流利英语开始了庆典，展现了乐其的专业性。

sentences.english: Boccaccino recommends that you use professional nursing combed wool.
sentences.chinese: 卡奇诺引荐您运用专业的羊毛护理梳。

sentences.english: Alterna Professional Haircare uses caviar extract in its Caviar Anti-Aging collection.

sentences.english: Form-filling guides and the required courses for specialization could be found in the application form.

sentences.english: Clay bars should only be used by professionals.
sentences.chinese: 研磨泥只适用于专业类产品吗？

sentences.english: You won't signify in such a thing,he's the specialist.
sentences.chinese: 在这种专业上你别假充内行了，他才是专家。

sentences.english: Financial college students' quality education has its special inner regularity.
